trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Fullerton
There were no other sightings in Fullerton on or around March 15th 2005
Summary: i was in my back yard when i became aware of the ufo.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my back yard just doing nothing,i looked up and noticed something bright like a star,it was unusual to see anything like that in the daytime,i continued to watch it and it moved thats when i knew it was a ufo,it moved in an l shape path i stood frozen for a few moments amazed at what i was seeingit also seemed to just hang in the sky like a brite little dot i had a feeling it could see mei was looking straight at it,waving my hands at it in a gesture of hello who are you,this all happend with in a few moments,i ran in to get my mother to come and see this,but it left,but i could swear that it was looking at me and it had some kind of life in itbecause of its actions,thats about it
